snippet: Baseball will be in for something new when the owners of the Mets go to court to face charges they enriched themselves with illegitimate profits from the Madoff scam.
abstract: Baseball will be in for something new when the owners of the New York Mets go to court to face charges they enriched themselves with illegitimate profits from the Madoff scam; for Mets owners Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz, jurors' feelings about the rich, both pro and con, could color their decision-making process.
lead_paragraph: Baseball will be in for something new when the owners of the Mets go to court to face charges they enriched themselves with illegitimate profits from the Madoff scam.

headline.seo: Wealth Could Be Risky Issue for Mets Owners Should They Face a Jury
headline.main: Wealth Could Be Risky Issue for Mets Owners Should They Face a Jury
headline.print_headline: For Mets Owners, Wealth May Pose Trial Risk
